attributes.action: STOP WASTING TAXPAYERS MONEY TO BAILOUT BANKS,CAR INDUSTRY,AND FRED GOODWIN!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Goverment is wasting taxpayers money to bail out the banks, the car industry anf of course Sir Fred Goodwin with his pension deal. what about us ordinary people who owe the banks and credit companies are hounded by them for noney or else we lose everything? Why dont you bail us,your people out first prime minister? without our money you are nothing, so are the banks.
Do we all stop paying our taxes so you have nothing?
We are all annoyed at your cowboy,slipshod way of working this deal with theses banks,car industry, and of course Sir Ken Goodwin. Without any consultation with the people. "YOU OWE US BIG STYLE SIR" so help us first write of our debts with the banks and credit card banks so we can star afresh...........like Sir Ken Goodwin!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
